We really enjoyed this place a lot -- it is one of the coolest looking restaurants we've seen in a while being a combination of an upscale food market and a restaurant.  I ordered some kind of charcoal grilled octopus which was one of the most amazing and unusual things I've ever put in my mouth.  I expected it to be rubbery but it was really tender and had a unique smoky flavor.  This should definitely be on the Barcelona agenda.  Also the "unitoilet" bathroom deserves a picture (I think there is already one posted on here)!
